monster.name: Draconic Companion
monster.languages: Draconic, understands any languages spoken by the Magus bound to it.

trait.name: Hit Dice
trait.text: Your Companion has a total number of d8 Hit Dice equal to your Magus level. It also gains all the normal benefits of both short and long rests.

trait.name: Soul Bound
trait.text: You add your PB to any ability check or saving throw that your Draconic Companion makes.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 +PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 +3 +PB slashing damage + 1d4 Essence damage.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Magus Class v4.2.2 p. 9 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Exalted Companion
monster.languages: Draconic, understands any languages spoken by the Magus bound to it.

trait.name: Hit Dice
trait.text: Your Companion has a total number of d10 Hit Dice equal to your Magus level. It also gains all the normal benefits of both short and long rests.

trait.name: Soul Bound
trait.text: You add your PB to any ability check or saving throw that your Exalted Companion makes.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 +5 magical slashing damage + 1d6 Essence damage.

action.name: Essence Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text:
Your Companion can exhale elemental energy in a 30-foot cone, forcing any creatures in that area to make a Dexterity saving throw. Creatures take 12d6 Essence damage on a failure, and half as much damage on a success.
This replaces your Elemental Breath feature.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's The Magus Class v4.2.2 p. 10 (Homebrew)
